definition: to persevere with/to persist in/to insist on
to hold/to grasp/to support/to maintain/to persevere/to manage/to run (i.e. administer)/to control
to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
to stick to sth without change (idiom); to persevere

sentences.english: All of them insisted on my staying with them a few days longer.
sentences.chinese: 他们所有的人都坚持要我再跟他们多呆几天时间。

sentences.english: He was getting through games last season on painkilling injections.
sentences.chinese: 去季他都是在注射止痛剂的情况下坚持上场的。

sentences.english: Third, we should pull with golf-related industries.
sentences.chinese: 三是要坚持拉动与高尔夫相关产业的发展。

sentences.english: If you carry on , ond day something good will happen .
sentences.chinese: 如果你坚持下去，总有一天会有好事情发生。

sentences.english: China always adheres to the road of peaceful development.
sentences.chinese: 中国始终坚持走和平发展道路。

sentences.english: As a result, it is not necessary to maintain a positive ketosis test long term.
sentences.chinese: 这样一来，就没有必要坚持长期测试积极酮症了。

sentences.english: We must persist in study on for good or for evil.
sentences.chinese: 无论好坏，我们都要坚持学完。

sentences.english: But the alibi did not hold up long.
sentences.chinese: 但是，不在场证明没坚持多久。

sentences.english: He persists in wearing that old-fashioned hat.
sentences.chinese: 他坚持要戴那顶旧帽子。

sentences.english: When her mother insisted she had to get something, Clarissa asked for socks.
sentences.chinese: 当她妈妈坚持让她选件礼物时，她要了袜子。

sentences.english: Beth kept on, with only slight relapses into idleness or grieving.
sentences.chinese: 只有贝思坚持不懈，极少躲懒或悲天悯人。

sentences.english: Li expressed his appreciations for Vanuatu's stance of adhering to the one-China principle.
sentences.chinese: 曾庆红对瑙鲁坚持一个中国政策表示赞赏。

sentences.english: He also reiterated that his country would continuously stick to the One China policy.
sentences.chinese: 罗普还重申斯将继续坚持一个中国的原则。

sentences.english: Mr Earnshaw has a mind to shoot you, if you persist in endeavouring to enter.''
sentences.chinese: ‘如果你坚持要进来，恩萧先生打算拿枪崩你。’

sentences.english: The fresh air and exercise cured him of his headache.
sentences.chinese: 呼吸新鲜空气和坚持锻炼把他的头痛病治好了。

sentences.english: Dissenters must be consistent, though, otherwise they'll fail to convince the majority.
sentences.chinese: 反对者必须坚持一致，否则就不能成功说服大多数人。

definition: to persevere unremittingly (idiom); to keep going until the end
to hold fast to/to stick to
determination/resolution/determined/firm and resolute/to make up one's mind/CL:個|个[ge4]
